items.title: Neurodiverse Children’s Emotional & Learning Experiences in Therapeutic Settings
items.subtitle: Constructivist grounded theory • 5 participants • NVivo coding
items.description: Child-centered qualitative study focusing on sensory-supportive environments, movement-based engagement, and relational attunement. Results highlight concrete practitioner implications across therapy and classroom contexts.

items.title: Safe Scroll — Digital Wellness Policy Brief
items.subtitle: Screen-time harms, algorithmic transparency, youth wellbeing
items.description: Policy framework and intervention concept aimed at reducing excessive and harmful screen behavior among children/adolescents. Includes program theory, metrics, and site (safe-scroll.com).

items.title: Music/AI Final Project
items.subtitle: Python + Librosa + pre-trained models
items.description: Audio analysis and creative tooling; 3.5-minute presentation plus paper documenting technical approach and reflections.
